item.description: The boxer bash is a fun filled day for not only Boxers, but families, kids, adults, it's fun for everyone. There will be raffles, a bbq, vendors, agilty courses, good canine testing, doggy washes and games. Its one of the largest events that Boxer Buddies organizes and its just all in all a fun day for everyone!! So please join in on the fun!!! There is an entrance fee and for any more details and information please go to www.boxerbuddies.org
item.name: Boxer Bash
